pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semi-Supervised Regression Methods // An implementation of semi- supervised regression methods including self-learning and co- training by committee based on Hady, M. F. A., Schwenker, F., Palm, G. (2009) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-04274-4_13. Users can define which set of regressors to use as base models from the 'caret' package, other packages, or custom functions.
